subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The 2011 Giro d’Italia will start on May 7 from Italy’s first capital, Turin, in celebration of Italy’s 150th anniversary of unification.
snippet: The 2011 Giro d’Italia will start on May 7 from Italy’s first capital, Turin, in celebration of Italy’s 150th anniversary of unification.
